department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: I'm a practicing software engineer and hold the IEEE CSDP certification. In former lives I've been a team lead for Orbitz Worldwide, software engineer for Argonne National Laboratory, and a field consultant and technical instructor with Sun Microsystems Educational Services, Chicago Systems Group (CSG) and Computer Sciences Corporation (CSC). I earned my MS in Software Engineering at CTI in 2002 and am currently pursuing my PhD in Computer Science at CDM under Dr. Xiaoping Jia.
